message:
"Digital Echoes of Ignorance"

In silicon jungle, a man displayed his hate,
Beyond his shadow, pixelated mockery modulates.
Court's verdict dances on the web, a triumphant waltz,
Seven years, six moons, a lesson in diversity's vaults,
Cyberspace blinks, erasing the ancient apes.

Jamie Arnold, 33, uttered racist remarks and made monkey gestures at the former Manchester United defender, who was working as a pundit for BT Sport, a court heard.
